title: Definition of Reference Angle
text: What is the reference angle? It is the angle in the 1st quadrant corresponsing to any angle. So it is an angle between $$0$$ and $$90$$ degrees or $$0$$ and $$\frac{\pi}{2}$$ radians that can be throught of as a shifted version of the terminal side of the original triangle.

title: Obtaining Reference Angle
text: To find the reference angle we can think of it as a symmetrical angle that our triangle would have in the 1st quadrant (try and draw the triangle). We can also add or subtract $$360$$ degress or $$2\pi$$ radians to get the same angle

title: Final Angle
text: What is the final reference angle in the 1st quadrant?
